channel.title: Galkon's Refactored (Client)Base
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=5][B][U]Galkon's Refactored Base[/U][/B][/SIZE] This client is a refactored, 317 client. It was made from a blank 317 deob. It is my effort and attempt to encourage users to switch over to refactored. It seems most people use Bluurr's or some version of it, well, that needs to stop. It is messy, poorly done, and it causes a lot of issues. Not only that but most help topics are about it or related to it.
Anyways, this client has more than any other base I've released. It is packed with useful things, and is ready for you people to start using it.
[COLOR=Red][b]Total downloads(updated daily): 2523[/b][/COLOR]
[B][COLOR=Red]This client [B]will not[/B] work with a server configured especially for Bluurr's. Remove all server edits you have for Bluurr's client.[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR=Red][B]NOTE: Please be sure to read the text below downloads![/B][/COLOR]
[B][U][SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B] -Fully working 503+ gameframe. -Fully working 503+ chat with channel buttons. -Basic orbs(you can do the rest). -3 gameframe pieces instead of 10+. -Easy custom sprite loading. -Able to load custom items. -Able to load custom interfaces. -Model preload + original model adding. -Hardly any bugs(known bugs are listed after features). -Simple fixes for things like friends list, etcetera. -Cleaned out all unnecessary loadings(sprites, image producers, etc). -Very easy and efficient to use.
[B][U][SIZE=3]Known Bugs/Issues[/SIZE][/U][/B] -Media(model display) in inventory is bugged[FIXED]. -Chat head displays are bugged[FIXED]. If you find more bugs, please post them here.
[B][U][SIZE=3]Downloads[/SIZE][/U][/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?nwhmzwhw1az]MediaFire[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/A6N9DJ9C]Uppit[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9TKUIJGY]MegaUpload[/url] [url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/efw14q]SendSpace[/url] [url=http://www.filefront.com/14052265/Galkon%27s%20Refactored.rar]FileFront[/url] I also suggest: [url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/notepad-plus/files/notepad%2B%2B%20releases%20binary/npp.5.4.5.Installer.exe/download]NotePad++(direct link)[/url]
Please read the README file inside for information about the client. I will be making tutorials from now on configured for this client. I will also always post the links to those tutorials, on this thread, below. If you have any questions or problems, please [u]feel free to ask[/u].
[B][U][SIZE=3]Tutorials[/SIZE][/U][/B] -[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397219.msg2949243.html#msg2949243]Clickable URL's in chatbox[/url] -[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397221.0.html]Adding 100% New RuneScape Tabs[/url] -[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397222.0.html]World Map Button w/ Hovering[/url] -
[B][U][SIZE=3]Pictures[/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://img.techpowerup.org/090715/Capture054.png[/img] [img]http://img.techpowerup.org/090716/Capture087.png[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/2enz4hi.jpg[/img], [url=http://i29.tinypic.com/2my0qwm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2zyyfiv.jpg[/img] [/CENTER][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2009, 11:42:35 pm[/size][hr][center][b][size=10pt][size=10pt]Bug Fixes[/size][/size][/b]
[u]Media(models in inventory) & chatheads fix[/u] Find: '[b]Texture.method365(479, 96);[/b]', and replace it with: [code]Texture.method365(519, 165);[/code] Two lines below that, replace '[B]Texture.method365(190, 261);[/B]' with: [code]Texture.method365(246, 335);[/code]
[u]Click here to continue color fix[/u] Find: '[b]if(DrawingArea.width == 497)[/b]', replace it with: [code]if(DrawingArea.width == 519)[/code] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

Are there any errors? The most common error is T2 - 81, packet 81 is playerupdating, and the most common error in that is player headicons/skullicons.

item.title: Galkon's Refactored (Client)Base
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

Well,He said to post bugs here so I found one: When you click the equip button you get this in the CMD

RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:201) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:297) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8377) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1846) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8208) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8946) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4736) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

and the client freezes!

oh,and still the client is awesome Btw!

Read full topic
